February 29, 2016 Charter News, Tips & Advice

Charter Vacations for the Family

Charter yachts provide freedom, flexibility and an array of activities to suit every guest. You can change location every day, without having to repack and lug suitcases from one hotel to the next. There’s no traffic, no crowds (unless you want to go ashore and get amongst them!), and your crew takes care of every aspect of the experience, from meals and cleaning up to cinema nights under starry skies.
All photos are credit to Billy Black

Best of all, activities and entertainment are contained upon your own, private yacht and its picturesque environs.

The charter experts at Luxury Charter Group have noticed an increase in the number of clients booking for larger extended family groups. The major factor in their choice of a luxury charter vacation is to spend quality time as a family, with enough space and diversity for relaxation, while being together as a family unit for milestone moments.

Multi-generational charters are proving very popular, mostly because a luxury charter yacht caters to the needs and wish-list of every member of the family – from those who wish to sit in a shady place and catch up on some reading while they soak up the serenity, to gourmands who like nothing better than sampling the cuisine of different regions and cultures, to the young and young at heart for whom watersports, angling, day trips and diving are the best way to spend a day!

Fun on the water brings everybody together. Younger family members can learn to sail, snorkel or enjoy the tow toys, while older teens love the thrill of jetskiing or flyboard-X, and everybody loves an inflatable slide!

Catering to different age brackets and inclinations is the first priority. After destination, your Luxury Charter Group charter expert will find the most suitable crew with the skills and willingness to fit in with your family's preferences.

Choose a yacht with generous deck spaces for children to comfortably roam in safety and for all guests to have the room to spread out.

Active, adventurous children will thrive in a charter vacation environment. For parents, the chance to relax and watch children revel in their new environment is truly a joy. Crew are on hand to teach kids new skills, from stand up paddling to cooking. Some yachts have crew who specialise in snorkelling and marine life, eager to share their knowledge of the undersea realm.

Other yachts have crew that embrace their inner child and can organise Pirate-themed treasure hunts, picnics on the beach, child-oriented excursions and on-water inflatable fun under qualified supervision.

Chefs on family-friendly yachts are well versed in creating menus that entice junior guests, tempting them to experiment local cuisine with enough variety that they are satisfied and delighted.

There are myriad choices of family-friendly yachts for charter. Let the experts at Luxury Charter Group provide you with a selection of charter yachts with the crew, facilities and ambience onboard to make yours the complete package for the whole clan!

Contact your charter expert at Luxury Charter Group now to organize your next luxury family charter.
